deck: Brother of Stan Lee and Legendary comic book writer, artist and co-creator of Iron Man, Thor, Loki and Odin (to name a few)
description: He is the brother of legendary comic creator Stan Lee. He worked for Marvel and Timely until 1974. Larry moved over to Atlas Comics as editor. He is best known for his work on Iron Man, Spider-Man comic strip as an artist, Hank Pym in Tales to Astonish, and countless westerns such as Kid Colt and Rawhide Kid.Co-creator ofIron ManThorLokiOdinBalder the BraveHeimdallTyrKorgYinsenRichard ParkerKronansKid Loki
name: Larry Lieber
